hadiths.text: Narrated As-Samma' sister of Abdullah ibn Busr: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Do not fast on Saturday except what has been made obligatory on you; and if one of you can get nothing but a grape skin or a piece of wood from a tree, he should chew it

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ أَنْ يُخَصَّ يَوْمُ السَّبْتِ بِصَوْمٍ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Specifying Saturday For Fasting
